item.description:
Tweetfeed is an interesting experimental FREE service courtesy of @davewiner it creates an RSS feed of a person's Twitter stream. I've just started playing with it. In fact I need to decide which RSS reader to use. Suggestions?

https://t.co/gSde8fdhwT

item.description: A delightful interview with Brian Kernighan, a true legend, with the focus on AWK. QUOTE:"If stranded on an island with only one programming language it would have to be C." https://t.co/ZuqT4dzgRK
